global_caption: a scene featuring a young man wearing a white shirt, black sunglasses, beige pants, and black shoes looking at a woman holding a camera, a fatty woman in a flower-patterned dress, jean shorts, and sandals holding a cup of coffee in her left hand and luggage in her right hand while looking at another woman who is holding a camera, a young man wearing a green T-shirt, beige short pants, and black sneakers with a gray watch on his left wrist holding something in both hands and interestingly watching the girl who holds a camera, a woman with long hair wearing a bright blue one-piece dress taking a photo with a camera in her right hand while holding a hat in her left hand, a hat on the woman, a map, and a coffee cup on the woman.
region_captions: A young man is wearing a white shirt, beige pants, and black shoes, with black sunglasses on. He is holding a camera in his right hand while looking at a woman who is holding a camera. His left hand is in his pocket, and he is wearing a watch on his left wrist. The man looks at the woman. The man is holding a map.

A fatty woman in a flower-patterned dress, jean shorts, and sandals is holding luggage in her left hand while looking at another woman who is holding a camera. The woman looks at the woman. The woman is holding a cup.

A young man is wearing a green T-shirt, beige short pants, and black sneakers. He has a gray watch on his left wrist and is holding something in both hands. His hands are in his pocket. He interestingly watches the girl who holds a camera. The man looks at the woman.
A woman with long hair is wearing a bright blue one-piece dress and sandals. She is holding a camera in her right hand and taking a photo. The woman is holding a hat.
A hat is on the woman.
A coffee cup is on the woman.
